After receiving a letter inviting [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] to a specific
location, [Name:PlayerNickname ] went there
and found...

Hello there, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I’ve been waiting for you.

Sorry for calling you out here without even
signing my name.

I didn’t want my title as Gym Leader to make you
feel obligated to come.
But I’m happy to see you.
Um, so...I invited you here because...

I wanted to give you this as a token of
my feelings.
For me?
Yes, of course! Is that really so surprising?
So that’s what this is about?
Yes, exactly!

As someone who teaches flower arrangement,
I felt giving you flowers in front of others might
draw too much attention.

The bouquet itself is meant to convey something
special, and that is...
Ehehe. Actually, I’ll keep that a secret.
I want to know!

If you learn more about flowers, maybe you’ll
figure it out.
What do you mean?

Every flower has its own meaning. That’s a hint
from me.

This could be an opportunity to develop a new
interest, [Name:PlayerNickname ].

Oh, you want to give me something in return?
That’s so thoughtful!
Let’s see...

Could you arrange a bouquet for me sometime,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?

If you’re not sure which flowers to choose or how
to arrange them... Eheh...
I’d be delighted to teach you!
